name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shuriken: Tasks manager for Invoice Ninja

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open-source alternative for the official Invoice Ninja: Tasks Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shuriken: Tasks Manager is an open-source tool designed to streamline your task management. It offers a powerful alternative to the official Invoice Ninja: Tasks Chrome extension, providing users with enhanced flexibility and control over their workflow.

Why Install?

- Task Management: Easily create, organize, and track tasks within a user-friendly interface.
- Time Tracking: Monitor the time spent on tasks to improve productivity and ensure accurate billing.
- Open-Source: Benefit from a community-driven project with regular updates and improvements.
